metadata.Title: CVE-2018-6127 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Early free of object in use in IndexDB in Google Chrome prior to67.0.3396.62 allowed a remote attacker who had compromised the rendererprocess to potentially perform a sandbox escape via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
oxide-qt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
